title: Large T206 Lot - All Cards $8, $10, or $13 each **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: Large T206 Lot - All Cards $8, $10, or $13 each **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. As you can see by the scans, these are lower grade cards.  Payment via any method you prefer. Please add $2 for shipping for 1-2 cards. Three or more cards ship for free.  Thanks for looking and feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

All cards in the first group are $8 each.
All cards in the second group are $10 each.
All cards in the third group are $13 each.

Take the remaining lot (25 cards) for $230.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier reading):

Mike
Bump for a price drop.  All cards now $8, $10, or $13 each.  Thanks!
